title: Aspen and the Dream Walkers
description: In Aspen's dreams, she's a clan princess. A fierce warrior with supernatural powers, saving children by fighting Chancellors in the city of Lanta. Her fantasy world is the only thing she relies on to get through the day. With a cruel stepdad and stepsister, Aspen clings to her vivid imagination to stay sane. The hot, new guy at school saves her from evil Chancellors in one of her dreams. But when Dylan calls her by name, and speaks to her for the first time in class, he mentions things she's dreamed about. How can he know about the city of Lanta and her Dream Walker clan, unless he's been there and itâ€™s actually real?If that world truly exists, she'll have to hone her battle skills, and stop saying how good his touch feels when she's dreaming.Book 1 in the Dream Walker series.
author: Caroline Swart
